mapper.insert: insert into IntegralMall_Banner( ID, Banner_Title, Url, Links, Indexs, Statu, Opt_Id) values (#{id},#{bannerTitle},#{url},#{links},#{indexs},#{statu}, #{optId})
mapper.select: select ID, Banner_Title, Url, Links, Indexs, Statu, CreateTime, Opt_Date, Opt_Id from IntegralMall_Banner where Banner_Title = #{bannerTitle} and ID != #{id}
mapper.update:
update IntegralMall_Banner
Banner_Title=#{bannerTitle},
Url=#{url},
Links=#{links},
Opt_Id=#{optId},
Opt_Date=now() ,
where ID=#{id}
update IntegralMall_Banner set Statu=#{statu} where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select ifnull(Indexs,0) from IntegralMall_Banner order by Indexs desc limit 1
select ib.ID, ib.Banner_Title, ib.Url, ib.Links, ib.Indexs, ib.Statu, ib.CreateTime, ib.Opt_Date, ib.Opt_Id from IntegralMall_Banner ib where ib.Statu = 1
